name: places/ChIJL7Gvz01YwokR3PAMPYVPX-w
adrFormatAddress: 572 11th Ave, New York, NY 10036, USA

originalText.text: Amazing building with beautiful views and outdoor spaces! The doormen and maintenance people are the best and most friendly. Always very helpful with everything we need! Have lived here for 3 years and renewing another 2!  Super clean and modern apartments! The best!

text.text: Amazing building with beautiful views and outdoor spaces! The doormen and maintenance people are the best and most friendly. Always very helpful with everything we need! Have lived here for 3 years and renewing another 2!  Super clean and modern apartments! The best!

originalText.text: The nicest place in town to live! The river is close, all the parks and dog places, and the building itself is marvelous - so modern, with all the glass and trees in the inner garden, the best view from the balcony! Very boutique feeling :)

text.text: The nicest place in town to live! The river is close, all the parks and dog places, and the building itself is marvelous - so modern, with all the glass and trees in the inner garden, the best view from the balcony! Very boutique feeling :)

originalText.text: I love all the amenities Oskar has the movie events are wonderful and a great way of meeting neighbors staff is amazingly nice ! This is a place I call home

text.text: I love all the amenities Oskar has the movie events are wonderful and a great way of meeting neighbors staff is amazingly nice ! This is a place I call home

originalText.text:
I lived here for two years, from 2021 to 2023, and I wouldn't recommend my friends to move here.

Noise Problems (I lived on the 5th floor and face the south & west side)
• There is traffic noise everyday afternoon during rush hours. (It is near the Lincoln Tunnel, and the intersection downstairs is jammed with rage drivers that will honk and yell nonstop until late at night. Saturday night is the worst that traffic noise will keep on until 1 - 2 am)

• After rush hour traffic noise, you will hear UPS delivery trucks running all night because there's the UPS building with all the delivery trucks operating all night.

• Noise from loud neighbors. The walls are so thin, and you can hear conversations and noise from next door or upstairs.
There's a period every year, Construction Noise by Con Edison or road repair on the weekend late at night...

• There was so much noise coming from different places, and we had to buy earplugs to sleep in...

Building & Management
• It takes so much time for the handyman to repair things; there's only one handyman for the entire building. After sending the repair request, I had to wait a week to get my oven fixed.

• I also experienced a hot water shutdown during wintertime.

• The interior is built with poor-quality materials. The ceiling had a leak problem from the rain once, and I found a big crack on the side of my kitchen window...

• Doormen are nice and friendly, but they can't help much with residents' complaints...

Location
• The location is ok; there are a lot of restaurants, bars, and grocery stores. There's a newly opened Target on 44th st which was nice.

• Too far from the train station, traffic is always terrible for Uber or taxis during the afternoon.

Rent
• It is overpriced for the service, location, sqaurefeet Oskar offers compared to other luxury buildings nearby (there are so many better ones around... )

• The building also increased by around 60% in the rent after my two-year lease... (I can't believe this is even legal. Read your contract carefully before signing...)

Overall, please do enough research before moving into any building... The noise is my biggest problem living here, and the management can't even help much. Won't recommend anyone moving here.

originalText.text: Great building, great amenities and Beautiful Rooftop. The Starbucks downstairs is also a life saver!

text.text: Great building, great amenities and Beautiful Rooftop. The Starbucks downstairs is also a life saver!
